name: Imminent (ThatOwlGuy)
description:
In Imminent you are facing the destruction of a curious universe. At the very end of this world, the only way out is through a gate at the top of the monument.

However, it is in disarray and only be traversed with a special power. As the sands of time recede from the world, find the power to survive this world and see what comes after the Imminent.

Controls Stuff: Using a mouse and keyboard, you can traverse this little ephemeral desert.

Mouse - You can look around.

W - forward

A - left

S - down

D - right

Left Shift - Sprint

Scroll Wheel - Select Powers

Left Click (With Destruction Power) - Damage Sandstone Rollers

Right Click (With Warp Power) - Quickly teleport to a space in front of you. Can also be used to move vertically.

Bug Fixes:

–Wrong textures on some of the obelisk platforms that are revealed when the sands move away.

–Removed Errant piece of Sandstone.

–Wrong name used for Warp power, should say “Warp” now

–Destroy Power not firing as far as it should be. Distance you can attack a roller is not longer halved.
